movies.title: Shao Lin Kung-Fu Mystagogue
movies.plot: The evil Ching government has taken over and is out to rid the land of the remaining Ming rebel patriots, including the still surviving Ming Prince. Unknowingly, the evil Ching overlord and his men capture the incognito Prince and throw him in jail. Hearing word of the Prince's capture, Shao Chang and Fang Ping mount a rescue effort to get the Prince before his identity is found out.
movies.simplePlot: The evil Ching government has taken over and is out to rid the land of the remaining Ming rebel patriots, including the still surviving Ming Prince. Unknowingly, the evil Ching overlord and...

biography.bio: Feng Hsu was born on August 17, 1950 in Taipei, Taiwan. She is an actress and producer, known for A Touch of Zen (1971), Legend of the Mountain (1979) and Raining in the Mountain (1979). She is married to David Tong. They have two children.
biography.name: Feng Hsu

biography.bio: Carter Wong was born on March 22, 1947 as Chia-Ta Huang. He is known for his work on Big Trouble in Little China (1986), Born invincible (1978) and Traitorous (1976).
biography.name: Carter Wong

biography.bio: Yi Chang was born on February 24, 1945 in Guangdong, China. He is an actor and director, known for The Bells of Death (1968), Salut Bruce Lee, bonjour le tigre (1976) and Le sabre écarlate (1971).
biography.name: Yi Chang

biography.bio: Chung-Kuei Chang is known for his work on Island of Fire (1990), Master of the Flying Guillotine (1976) and New Fists of Fury (1976).
biography.name: Chung-Kuei Chang

biography.bio: Pao-Shan Chang is an actor, known for Shing le fantastique Mandchou (1976), The Wheel of Life (1983) and Ting yuan shen shen (1987).
biography.name: Pao-Shan Chang

biography.bio: Shao-Peng Chen was born in 1933 in Taiwan. He is known for his work on Election (2005), Yin yang xie di zi (1977) and Choy Lay Fut (1979). He died in 2005 in Taiwan.
biography.name: Shao-Peng Chen

biography.bio: Pin Chiang is an actor and director, known for Revenge of the Iron-Fist Maiden (1972), Mang nu jue dou gui jian chou (1970) and Hei bai shuang xia (1971).
biography.name: Pin Chiang

biography.bio: Kang Chin was born on August 26, 1939 in Taiwan. He is known for his work on Master of the Flying Guillotine (1976), Shaolin Wooden Men (1976) and Salut Bruce Lee, bonjour le tigre (1976).
biography.name: Kang Chin

biography.bio: Chiang Han was born on May 20, 1920 in Beijing, China. He is an actor and production manager, known for The Fastest Sword (1968), Rikisha kuri (1974) and Les disciples de Shaolin (1975).
biography.name: Chiang Han

biography.bio: Han Hsieh was born on September 23, 1922 in China. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Dragon Inn (1967), Hei xuan feng (1970) and Le Dieu de la guerre (1973).
biography.name: Han Hsieh

biography.bio: Wei Hu is an actor, known for The Killer Meteors (1976), Lantern Festival Adventure (1979) and Shao Lin Kung-Fu Mystagogue (1977).
biography.name: Wei Hu

biography.bio: Phillip Ko was born on June 18, 1949 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Phillip Ko Fei. He was an actor and director, known for Mo (1983), A Killer's Romance (1990) and Mu zhong wu ren (1989). He was married to Madie and Yukari Ôshima. He died on March 30, 2017 in Hong Kong, China.
biography.name: Phillip Ko

biography.bio: Chiu Lee is an actor and director, known for Executioners from Shaolin (1977), Guangdong tie qiao san (1979) and Juan xing quan fa yu fa (1978).
biography.name: Chiu Lee

biography.bio: Hsiao Ming Li is known for his work on New Fists of Fury (1976), Bloody Monkey Master (1977) and Shao Lin Kung-Fu Mystagogue (1977).
biography.name: Hsiao Ming Li

biography.bio: Hsin Hua Li is an actor, known for Shi Yan Wen (1971), Bai Ma Su che gou hun fan (1979) and 7 Grandmasters (1977).
biography.name: Hsin Hua Li
